Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
Bad Sound, Put few hundred more to get better one


Maine pehle Oppo Enco M31 use kiya hai, jo behtareen tha (I had used Oppo Enco M31 earlier which gave me excellent service)Ab iss Ptron Urban tangent ke baare me (Now about this Ptron Urban tangent)Pros: kuch accha nahi hai, bas chalta hai itna hi accha hai iss headphone me (None about the product except for the fact that it works)Cons: (a) Behad bekaar awaaz hai iski (Very bad sound output)(b) Call sunna bhi thoda mushkil hai (Attending calls is also difficult due to low voice of caller)(c) Pata hi nahi chalta ki charging complete hui hai ya nahi (Unable to identify whether it is fully charged or not)Conclusion: Thode paise or daalkar acche brand ka le lo

Name: Dinesh s.
Review:
It is a Great Product Just Go for It


It is a nice and value for money product.Mai ise almost 2 months se use kar rha hu aur mujhe ab tk koi problem nahi mili.Battery backup bahut jabardast hai mai daily 5-7 hour use krta hu phir bhi 5-6 din aaram se chal jata hAnd isme low latency ka feature bhi bahut badhiya hai just middle button ko 3 times press Krna hai aur gaming mode on ho jayegaCons:- cons me bas yahi laga ki left side wire thodi slim hai baaki sb best hai
